video_prompt: A character's head subtly tilts, eyes shifting gaze to engage. Blushing intensifies, golden earrings subtly sway. Long hair undulates. Geometric patterns on clothing subtly realign. Swirling background colors dynamically evolve, floral motifs gently unfurling and receding, revealing artist's signature.
image_prompt: Vibrant anime illustration of a character with long black hair and green eyes, waist-up, slightly off-center right, head tilted left, engaging viewer. Fair skin, blushing cheeks. Wearing a colorful, geometric short-sleeved top with high black collar, black and grey striped sleeves, and dark purple pants with a black belt and gold buckle. Colorful, swirling background with pink, orange, yellow, and vibrant floral motifs.
refined_video_prompt: Character's head subtly tilts, gaze shifting to engage, as blushing intensifies. Golden earrings gently sway, and long hair undulates. Geometric clothing patterns dynamically realign. Background colors swirl and evolve, with floral motifs unfurling, receding, and progressively revealing an artist's signature.
